description.plain:
Rakim Hasheem Allen (December 9, 1991 – September 12, 2022), professionally known as PnB Rock, was a hip-hop and R&B artist from Philadelphia who rapidly emerged onto the scene behind the success of his hit 2014 single “My City Need Something,” which was inspired by an increasing amount of violence in Philadelphia.

Rock was encouraged to pursue music in a more serious manner by his uncle “Uncle Moe”; when his uncle passed away, Rock used the pain as fire to ignite a work ethic that has contributed to his early success.

After releasing a trio of “RnB” mixtapes between 2014 and 2015, PnB Rock popped onto the mainstream hip-hop scene with his mixtape GTTM: Goin Thru The Motions, released on January 13th, 2017.

After the release of his debut album, Rock had a slew of consecutive successes, including two tracks on the soundtrack for the box office behemoth The Fate of the Furious and a spot on the 2017 XXL Freshman Cover.

On September 12, 2022, Rock was fatally shot during an attempted robbery at Roscoe’s House of Chicken ‘N Waffles in Los Angeles. He was 30 years old at the time of his death.

songs.title: Selfish

description.plain:
PnB Rock sings about wanting a particular girl all to himself on his breakthrough hit “Selfish.”

The track was the lead single for his GTTM: Goin Thru The Motions commercial mixtape.

songs.title: Unforgettable (Freestyle)

description.plain:
After coming on the Dominic Cruz show at Power 106 Los Angeles and freestyling over the “Unforgettable” by French Montana beat with some help from Lechero, PnB recorded a solo version of the freestyle and released it on his SoundCloud page two days later.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oK4JEVbq9zg

songs.embed_content: Read “Unforgettable (Freestyle)” by PnB Rock on Genius

songs.title: Misunderstood

description.plain: The concept behind GTTM: Goin Thru The Motions, Rock’s debut album, is to showcase him vacillating between the emotions that someone living his lifestyle feels. Most notably, in his music, the two extremes are a bachelor who embraces his debauchery and a man who is ready to commit. “Misunderstood” shows Rock in a misunderstanding with one of his love interests due to the fact that they are on different pages in terms of their relationship. Though he told her that he wasn’t going to commit, she still expects him to, and he feels trapped and constrained.

Most notably, in his music, the two extremes are a bachelor who embraces his debauchery and a man who is ready to commit. “Misunderstood” shows Rock in a misunderstanding with one of his love interests due to the fact that they are on different pages in terms of their relationship. Though he told her that he wasn’t going to commit, she still expects him to, and he feels trapped and constrained.

songs.lyrics:
22 ContributorsMisunderstood Lyrics[Chorus]
Girl I told you what it was, I let you know
I kept it all the way real, 'cause I been here before
I gave you every chance for you to let it go
I'm too busy living life and fuckin' hoes
Yeah, but I know I treat you so good
And I know I eat you so good
And I know it's hard to find a nigga like me 'cause I keep it so hood
And I ain't into breaking hearts, I swear I would take it all back if I could
Let's get this understood, right now we're misunderstood

[Verse 1]

You ain't my mom or my PO, ain't got to answer you, I'm grown

[Pre-Chorus]

I'm just tryna tell you how I feel now
I'mma be the same, shawty, I probably won't change for a while
But I just wanna know is you still down?
